title: Ep. 243 Dan Ferris: Crash Course on Value Investing
itunes:title: Dan Ferris: Crash Course on Value Investing
description: This week, Dan Ferris, editor of Extreme Value, joins S&A Investor Radio to share his favorite ideas.He breaks down his methodology for picking deep value stocks and explains why a particular pick was recently sold in his model portfolio... Here you find out every detail that Dan looks for when picking stocks.And if you listen to any of Porter's shows, you know how much he encourages investors to use trailing stops… but find out why Dan says he NEVER uses them.Plus, you won't want to miss this... Dan shares his two favorite stocks to buy right now.Enjoy!
